page.title: 02REDEVELOPMENT OF YIEWSLEY
page.content: In the past few years Yiewsley High St has undergone extensive redevelopment. The main change is the closing and demolition of existing shops with prestigious office blocks being built in their place.Four such buildings have already been completed.Much office space is still available for let.In fact 127,500 sq feet are still available.Despite this,many shops are derelict and await demolition presumably to be replaced by further commercial concerns.Not all of the space will be used as offices some will be used for trading.It is likely that the office blocks are for companies dealing heavily with Heathrow Airport.For such companies there are distinct advantages in being located only two miles north of Britain's foremost airport.
